nodes.text: Anakin Skywalker's quarters were the private quarters of the Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker. They were located in the Jedi Temple on Coruscant. While most Jedi quarters were usually simple and sparsely furnished, Skywalker's room was abundantly decorated with old Podracing posters. During the Clone Wars, he would spend his off-hours tinkering with various pieces of machinery.
